name: Miney Company: A Data Racket
description: Data mining takes on a new dimension in Virtual Reality!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (64 bit) Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Yes
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 (64 bit) Processor: Intel i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Definitely Yes
